archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.12: A set of authorised code snippets (e.g. predefined pieces of code either created internally or obtained from trusted open-source software repositories) should be inserted into containerised application code to automatically perform security-related tasks.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
